turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking a black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, whole milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. And I'd like that in a Grande size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering a grande black and white mocha with whole milk and whipped cream, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i place your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a grande black and white mocha with whole milk and whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks in westlake, daly city, ca, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that should be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
